Package gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.document

Interface XPathEvaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractXPathEvaluator, JDOMBasedXPathEvaluator
    public interface XPathEvaluator
    Implementations of this interface provide XPath evaluation capabilities over a specific XML document.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T> List<T> evaluate​(String xpath, QName returnType, org.jdom2.filter.Filter<T> filter)
      Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a list of node results matching the provided filter.
      <T> List<T> evaluate​(String xpath, org.jdom2.filter.Filter<T> filter)
      Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a list of node results matching the provided filter.
      <T> T evaluateSingle​(String xpath, QName returnType, org.jdom2.filter.Filter<T> filter)
      Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a single node result matching the provided filter.
      <T> T evaluateSingle​(String xpath, org.jdom2.filter.Filter<T> filter)
      Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a single node result matching the provided filter.
      XPathContext getContext​(String xpath)
      The method will return the Context, the location within an XML document, for a provided XPath expression.
      NamespaceContext getNamespaceContext()
      Retrieves an object that can be used for processing namespace contexts.
      XPathVariableResolver getXPathVariableResolver()
      Retrieves the resolver used to process XPath variables.
      void setNamespaceContext​(XPathNamespaceContext nsContext)
      Used to set handler for prefix-to-namespace mapping and other related operations.
      void setXPathVariableResolver​(XPathVariableResolver resolver)
      Set a user provided XPath variable resolver that can be used to resolve variables that appear in XPath statements.
      boolean test​(String xpath)
      Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a boolean result indicating if a non-empty result was found matching the XPath expression.

    • Method Detail

      • getNamespaceContext

        NamespaceContext getNamespaceContext()
        Retrieves an object that can be used for processing namespace contexts.
        Returns:
        the current namespace context handler in effect, or null if no handler is in effect.

      • setNamespaceContext

        void setNamespaceContext​(XPathNamespaceContext nsContext)
        Used to set handler for prefix-to-namespace mapping and other related operations. The utility class XPathNamespaceContext must be used to define namespace mappings.
        Parameters:
        nsContext - the new namespace context to use that will replace the existing context handler
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If nsContext is null.

      • getXPathVariableResolver

        XPathVariableResolver getXPathVariableResolver()
        Retrieves the resolver used to process XPath variables.
        Returns:
        the current variable resolver in effect, or null if no resolver is in effect.

      • setXPathVariableResolver

        void setXPathVariableResolver​(XPathVariableResolver resolver)
        Set a user provided XPath variable resolver that can be used to resolve variables that appear in XPath statements.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the new variable resolve to use that will replace the existing resolver
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If resolver is null.

      • evaluate

        <T> List<T> evaluate​(String xpath,
                     org.jdom2.filter.Filter<T> filter)
              throws XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a list of node results matching the provided filter. A filter can be created using the Filters class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to be filtered against when building the result set
        Parameters:
        xpath - the XPath expression to evaluate
        filter - the filter to use to limit the returned results, or null if no filter is to be applied
        Returns:
        a non-null result
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - if an error occurred while evaluating the XPath expression

      • evaluate

        <T> List<T> evaluate​(String xpath,
                     QName returnType,
                     org.jdom2.filter.Filter<T> filter)
              throws XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a list of node results matching the provided filter. A filter can be created using the Filters class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to be filtered against when building the result set
        Parameters:
        xpath - the XPath expression to evaluate
        returnType - the expected object type of the return value, which is one of XPathConstants
        filter - the filter to use to limit the returned results, or null if no filter is to be applied
        Returns:
        a non-null result
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - if an error occurred while evaluating the XPath expression

      • evaluateSingle

        <T> T evaluateSingle​(String xpath,
                     org.jdom2.filter.Filter<T> filter)
              throws XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a single node result matching the provided filter. A filter can be created using the Filters class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to be filtered against when determining the result
        Parameters:
        xpath - the XPath expression to evaluate
        filter - the filter to use to limit the returned result, or null if no filter is to be applied
        Returns:
        the matching result, or null if no result matched
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - if an error occurred while evaluating the XPath expression

      • evaluateSingle

        <T> T evaluateSingle​(String xpath,
                     QName returnType,
                     org.jdom2.filter.Filter<T> filter)
              throws XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a single node result matching the provided filter. A filter can be created using the Filters class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to be filtered against when determining the result
        Parameters:
        xpath - the XPath expression to evaluate
        returnType - the expected object type of the return value, which is one of XPathConstants
        filter - the filter to use to limit the returned result, or null if no filter is to be applied
        Returns:
        the matching result, or null if no result matched
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - if an error occurred while evaluating the XPath expression

      • test

        boolean test​(String xpath)
      throws XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath expression, returning a boolean result indicating if a non-empty result was found matching the XPath expression.
        Parameters:
        xpath - the XPath expression to evaluate
        Returns:
        true if at least one match to the expression was found, or false otherwise
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - if an error occurred while evaluating the XPath expression

      • getContext

        XPathContext getContext​(String xpath)
                 throws XPathExpressionException
        The method will return the Context, the location within an XML document, for a provided XPath expression. The provided XPath expression must evaluate to a single Content or Attribute result.
        Parameters:
        xpath - the XPath expression to find the context for
        Returns:
        the context of the evaluated XPath expression result
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - if an error occurred while evaluating the XPath expression
